title: Ernest W. Spangler Stadium
text: Ernest W. Spangler Stadium is a 9,000-seat <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Boiling%20Springs%2C%20North%20Carolina">Boiling Springs, North Carolina</a>. It is home to the <a href="Gardner%E2%80%93Webb%20University">Gardner–Webb University</a> <a href="Gardner%E2%80%93Webb%20Runnin%27%20Bulldogs%20football">Bulldogs</a> <a href="American%20football">football</a> team. The facility opened in 1969. Spangler Stadium underwent a $7 million overhaul in 2005 that included additions of a new Football Center that houses football coaches' offices, athletic weight facilities, president's box, press box, and other luxury boxes.
